MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 1:17AM in the CH5 postcode area of Shotton following safety concerns on the underground cable network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20AM on 13th January 2021.
